name: Orc's Bride
description:
She was proposed to by the Orc Prince.
A goverment fearful of war with the Orc Empire decided to hand her over and placed a hefty bounty on her. In this world, everyone is an enemy. Fight and keep on fighting.

Simple and exhilarating action


The game controls and system are very simple and easy. However, the exhilarating action, responding to player inputs, immerses you in a brawl with the entire world.

Knock out enemies and collect clothing.


Defeat enemies to earn rewards in the form of gold, which you can use to purchase clothing. Equip better outfits to enhance your abilities and take down even more enemies.
